basics.name: Victoria Valverde
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024. After college I intend to pursue a career in cybersecurity.

education.institution: Coastal Carolina Community College, Jacksonville, NC

work.summary: Assisting students with enrollment needs and processing necessary documents.

Answered incoming calls promptly and provided accurate information to students and visitors

work.summary: Worked as a barista, wine bartender, and cashier in Waikiki.

Prepared and served coffee beverages, wine, and other menu items with precision and efficiency

Took on leadership responsibilities as shift lead, coordinating team members and ensuring smooth operations

work.summary: Provided a welcoming enviornment for reservations and new guests

Provided training and support to onboarding hostesses

work.summary: Worked as a barista in Waikiki, Hawaii.
highlights: Mastered various coffee brewing techniques and consistently delivered high-quality beverages to customers
Provided excellent customer service, ensuring a positive experience for each guest

work.summary: Worked as a cashier and beauty specialist.

work.summary: Worked as a barista in California.
highlights: Maintained cleanliness and organization of store, contributing to a welcoming atmosphere for customers

work.summary: Provided heavy equipment support and maintained readiness standards.

volunteer.summary: Reduced litter and also saved taxpayers dollars annually in roadside cleanup costs.
